title: Red Bull Music Academy Canada
subtitle: 7-year partnership covering independent music across Canada for RedBullTV and YouTube
summary: A seven-year partnership with Red Bull Canada creating content for their Music Academy, covering independent music across Canada for RedBullTV, YouTube, and podcast networks.
challenge: Document and promote Canada's independent music scene while maintaining Red Bull's brand standards and global content quality.
solution: We became Red Bull's Canadian music content creators, producing hundreds of videos, interviews, and branded content segments that showcased emerging artists.
results: Content distributed on RedBullTV and YouTube
Foundation for Juniper Island's music industry expertise

sections.content: From 2012 to 2019, we served as Red Bull Canada's go-to content creators for their Music Academy, documenting the incredible diversity and talent within Canada's independent music scene.

sections.title: The Challenge
sections.content: How do you authentically represent Canada's vast and diverse independent music scene while maintaining Red Bull's high production standards?

Our approach combined Johnny's broadcast experience from MTV Canada with deep knowledge of the Canadian music landscape, creating content that felt both professional and authentically connected to the artists.

sections.alt: Behind the scenes of Red Bull Music Academy filming
sections.caption: Behind the scenes: Documenting Canada's independent music scene for Red Bull Music Academy

sections.content: Over seven years, we created a comprehensive content library that spanned genres, regions, and career stages, always with a focus on emerging talent and authentic storytelling.

items: Music festival coverage and event documentation

sections.text: Working with Red Bull Canada was foundational to our understanding of music culture and authentic artist representation. It shaped how we approach creative partnerships.
sections.author: Johnny Hockin

sections.content: This partnership established Juniper Island as a trusted name in Canadian music content creation and provided the foundation for our expertise in authentic cultural storytelling.

sections.title: Key Insight
sections.content: Long-term partnerships allow for deeper cultural understanding and more authentic content creation. The best brand partnerships feel like natural collaborations.
